## Dream11 - A Fantasy Sports Platform

Dream11 is a fantasy sports platform that allows users to create their own virtual team and compete with others to win cash prizes. It is one of the most popular fantasy sports platforms in India, with millions of users and a wide range of sports to choose from.

### How does it work?

Users can choose from a variety of sports, including cricket, football, basketball, baseball, kabaddi, and more. Once they have selected a sport, they can create their own virtual team by selecting real-life players from the teams participating in the upcoming matches.

Users can choose a captain and a vice-captain for their team, who will earn more points than the other players. They can also make substitutions before the match starts, and even during the match, depending on the rules of the particular sport.

Once the match is over, users are awarded points based on the performance of their virtual team. The user with the highest points at the end of the match or tournament wins cash prizes.

### Is it legal?

Dream11 is legal in India and has been recognized by the Supreme Court as a game of skill, rather than a game of chance. This means that users can participate in the platform without fear of legal repercussions.

### Conclusion

Dream11 is a fun and exciting way for sports fans to get involved in their favorite sports and earn cash prizes at the same time. With a wide range of sports to choose from, and the ability to create their own virtual teams, users are sure to find something they enjoy on the platform.
